SEARCH
Package neuralnetwork

Class LayerArchitecture

java.lang.Object
neuralnetwork.LayerArchitecture
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class LayerArchitecture extends Object implements Serializable
This class describes the dimensions of a layer of a neural network.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • rows

      public final int rows
      Each row is meant to represent a node, and the number of columns is the number of weights in each node. The number of columns does not include the bias.

    • cols

      public final int cols
      Each row is meant to represent a node, and the number of columns is the number of weights in each node. The number of columns does not include the bias.

    • startIndex

      public final int startIndex
      Each row is meant to represent a node, and the number of columns is the number of weights in each node. The number of columns does not include the bias.

    • networkArchitecture

      public final Architecture networkArchitecture
      The architecture for this layer.

  • Constructor Details

    • LayerArchitecture

      public LayerArchitecture(int numNodes, int numWightsPerNode, int startIndex, Architecture network)
      Parameters:
      numNodes - The number of nodes in the layer. This is the number or rows in the layer's matrix.
      numWightsPerNode - The number of weights each node has. This is the number of columns int the layer's matrix.
      startIndex - The index this networks weights start at in the networks weight vector
      network - The architecture for this layer.

  • Method Details

      The number of values held in the layer.

      The number of values held in the layer.
